attributes.action: Create a fund to compensate the victims of flooding of domestic premises by a levy on council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent flooding has highlighted the problems of obtaining insurance for those of limited means and/ or those who live in flood prone areas. 
It appears that climate change may make floods more frequent, a recent increase in housing built on flood plains has increased the number of properties at risk. A ring- fenced government fund is needed, the cost could be reasonable if shared by the whole community. The government should at the same time commit to more investment in flood prevention.
